laboratory_examinations.findings: CBD dilation to 8mm, cholelithiasis without signs of cholecystitis.
Moderate intrahepatic and extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation.
Possibly small left lower lobe infiltrate versus pneumonitis.

2 small opacities in the anterior mediastinum unchanged from prior exam. Decreased atelectatic changes adjacent to right diaphragm. Possible consolidation in the left lung base, but developing pneumonia cannot be excluded. Blunting of costophrenic angles bilaterally.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Atelectatic changes adjacent to the right diaphragm are decreased.
